headers.value: default-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.bootcdn.net https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/ https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' data: https://cdn.bootcdn.net https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/ https://fonts.gstatic.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: *; connect-src *;
